name: Love You Pets
description:
Treat Yo'self!

It's time for a little self-care in this very special pet sim, where you take care of a pet unlike any other!

Take a picture, choose your pet, and then use your finger to give your pet what it needs to stay Happy, Healthy, and Fed. Yes you can put Speedos on a dog in this game.

Face tracking is used to place face photos on your dog and the mesh is animated to emote your face (or your friend's faces, or whoever's face you used to make your pet!). It results in fun / creepy people-pup pets! Enjoy.

Also available on Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/loveyoupets/265469

Originally made for PIGsquad's Summer Slow Jam 2017 - theme "Gadgets - Unconventional Pets". Currently built out for Android devices.
